column4: I have a problem with the Gnome panels. Does anybody know how I can fix this problem? (http://bugzilla.ubuntu.com/show_bug.cgi?id=20833)
Can someboddy tell me if there is a simple solution for this problem? http://bugzilla.ubuntu.com/show_bug.cgi?id=20833
And if I markt it for the right package?
It would be nice to have a lock option for the toolbar.
